Plot: Strange things begin to happen when a group of friends gather for a dinner party on an evening when a comet is passing overhead.
Title: Coherence
Writer: James Ward Byrkit (screenplay), James Ward Byrkit (story by), Alex Manugian (story by)
Actors: Emily Baldoni, Maury Sterling, Nicholas Brendon, Lorene Scafaria
tomatoConsensus: A case study in less-is-more filmmaking, Coherence serves as a compelling low-budget calling card for debuting writer-director James Ward Byrkit.
